name: Anthropophobia
description:
A GameBoy styled game where a man starts off his new job, within walking distance from his home. It's not long before he is wrapped in fear and anxiety.

Credits: 

Peter Milko (Pixel Pete): https://petermilko.itch.io/ (Tilesets, Base character sprites, Several other sprites)

yoanqwp#8156 (Discord) (Assets from a Tileset)

krümel (crumb)#0723: (Discord) (music)

DeerTears  / Ember#1765 (Discord) (music)

Tomas Danko (music)

Very thankful for all the assets found at

https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets

Made with GB Studio: https://www.gbstudio.dev/
